channel.title: Barrage doesnt totally freeze. - Deltascape
channel.description: When i go to barrage someone (and not splash off) they cannot click to move. But if they click Attack on the target they will move to the player and attack them. Or the frozen player can click follow on someone and start moving. How do i change it so that if they do click attack or follow they still will be unable to walk/run/move.

item.title: Barrage doesnt totally freeze. - Deltascape
item.dc:creator: @TimeWarp TimeWarp
item.description:
@TimeWarp wrote:

Jeremy they DO have a tut for how tofix this but they had it 2008 December so the mods probally deleted it by now like they delete everything… i just got into coding againa and atm im looking for this tut because i had it fixed but i forgot the coding for it

Read full topic

item.title: Barrage doesnt totally freeze. - Deltascape
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

well can’t i just do something like

if frozen = true;

then finish the code to make it when you are applyed frozen that the attack and follow option dissapears?

Read full topic
